title: Engr Electrophysiology
description: Basic concepts of electrophysiology from an engineering perspective. Functionality of relevant organs and systems; instrumentation tools which monitor electrophysiology function. Crosslisted with ECE 4784.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 3040 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECE 3510 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
